about:
Hi everyone

The people who were wondering who I am. I am a person that joined this server 11 days ago and this server was a good server to join because It had destroy the core, and Capture the wool. I was on a server called oc,tc which is a server that is like avicus network but more games. One of my friends was using my account to grief teammates with TNT and I got ban for 7 days. Then later on, that friend of mine went on my appeal and started to chat and argue with the owners and I was seeing it. Permanent ban came in, I needed help so bad. I went on someone else's account and told the owners that my friend was using my account and was killing teammates with TNT, told him that I neeed help. Then that person that my friend was playing on my account. His account got banned from oc.tc and his account got abandon by the minecraft owner. They were trying to get me back, but they couldn't really. I found a server which was this and I finally got more friends that are very nice to me. Thank you all you guys. I know this was a sad minecraft life for me but I finally got his account abandon and he could not play minecraft again. I'm glad for your guys support. Thank you all everyone. I will not be seeing you this January or February, maybe February 4th but I will see you guys on spring break. Sorry that I cannot see you because school is my importance. Thank you for respecting me. I will see you then.                                                                                                                                                                                                                            thank you
